data.name: CSCAN0260_MatchDetails
data.value: Validate, rotate and remove the secrets in file, use a secured secret store to save credentials.

data.name: CredScanSuppressionsWithoutFileHashOrPlaceholder
data.value: One or more suppression elements in the credential suppression file (.config/CredScanSuppressions.json) did not contain suppression criteria (file, hash or placeholder element)

data.name: CSCAN0060_MatchDetails
data.value: Found PEM certificate file with private key.

data.name: BlockReleaseDefinitionSaveWhenHighConfidenceSecretsAreFound

data.name: CSCAN0020_MatchDetails
data.value: Found base64 encoded certificate with private key in source file.

data.name: CredScanSuppressionsElementDeserializationError

data.name: CSCAN0041_MatchDetails
data.value: Found Azure storage account access key in source code.

data.name: CSCAN0250_MatchDetails
data.value: Found JSON web token or refresh token in source code.

data.name: CredScanSuppressionsNoSuppressionDefinitions
data.value: The credential suppression file (.config/CredScanSuppressions.json) exists, but did not contain any suppression definitions. Global suppressions will not be applied to the push.
